author: unico
msg: change getContentLength behavior when dealing with a collection because
the actual content length returned by the webdav source in case of a collectoin is not 0
since an xml representation is generated in that case.
Returning -1 solves a problem with sitemap components that return false to shouldSetContentLength()

author: unico
msg: add apache licensed JTA jar from Geronimo project in order
to eliminate the need for users supply their own from sun

author: kpiroumian
msg: Reload the translation if the dictionary was modified.
